snippet: Yaya Toure has said the excitement of being part of Manchester City's assault on the Premier League title has made him feel like a child again....
lead_paragraph: Yaya Toure has said the excitement of being part of Manchester City's assault on the Premier League title has made him feel like a child again.

headline.main: Toure Excited to Rejoin Man City's Title Challenge
headline.print_headline: Toure Excited to Rejoin Man City's Title Challenge
